\documentclass[english]{article}
\usepackage[T1]{fontenc}
\usepackage[latin9]{inputenc}
\usepackage{url}
\usepackage{graphicx}

\usepackage{babel}

\begin{document}

\title{\includegraphics{images/canorus}}

\maketitle
\tableofcontents{}


\part{Introduction}

Canorus is a free cross-platform music score editor. Our website is
\url{http://www.canorus.org}.


\part{Writing music}


\section{Inserting notes and rests}

Left click on staff, insert playable icon \includegraphics[scale=0.5]{images/insertplayable},
select note length at top and click on the staff. Right click for
rests.


\part{Printing}

Canorus uses external typesetters for printing.


\part{Import and export}

Canorus exports to Midi, MusicXml and Lilypond format. Canorus imports
MusicXml.
\end{document}
